multiple.description: Whether to enable multi-select mode (search is enabled by default in multi-select mode)
multiple.description_zh: 是否开启多选模式（多选模式默认开启搜索）

:v-model.type: string| number| boolean| Record<string, any>| (string | number | boolean | Record<string, any>)[]

default-value.type: string| number| boolean| Record<string, unknown>| (string | number | boolean | Record<string, unknown>)[]

v-model:input-value.description: Enter a value for the field

default-input-value.description: Default value for input field (uncontrolled mode)
default-input-value.description_zh: 输入框的默认值（非受控模式）

size.description: Select the size of the box

loading.description: Whether it is in the Loading state

error.description: Whether it is in an error state

allow-clear.description: Whether or not to allow emptying

:max-tag-count.description: In multi-select mode, the maximum number of labels displayed. 0 indicates no limit
:max-tag-count.description_zh: 多选模式下，最多显示的标签数量。0 表示不限制

bordered.description: Whether to display the border of the input box
bordered.description_zh: 是否显示输入框的边框

default-active-first-option.description: Whether the first option is selected by default when there is no value
default-active-first-option.description_zh: 是否在无值时默认选择第一个选项

v-model:popup-visible.description: Whether or not to display a drop-down menu

default-popup-visible.description: Whether the pop-up box is visible by default (uncontrolled mode)
default-popup-visible.description_zh: 弹出框默认是否可见（非受控模式）

unmount-on-close.description: Whether to destroy the element when the drop-down menu is closed
unmount-on-close.description_zh: 是否在下拉菜单关闭时销毁元素

filter-option.description: Whether or not to filter options

:virtual-list-props.description: Pass the virtual list property with this parameter to turn on virtual scrolling VirtualListProps
:virtual-list-props.description_zh: 传递虚拟列表属性，传入此参数以开启虚拟滚动 VirtualListProps

:trigger-props.description: Trigger properties of the drop-down menu
:trigger-props.description_zh: 下拉菜单的触发器属性

:fallback-option.type: boolean| (( value: string | number | boolean | Record<string, unknown> ) => SelectOptionData)
:fallback-option.description: Option that does not exist in custom values
:fallback-option.description_zh: 自定义值中不存在的选项

show-extra-options.description: Whether or not to display additional options in the drop-down menu
show-extra-options.description_zh: 是否在下拉菜单中显示额外选项

value-key.description: The name of the attribute used to determine the value of the option key
value-key.description_zh: 用于确定选项键值的属性名

:search-delay.description: The delay in triggering the search event
:search-delay.description_zh: 触发搜索事件的延迟时间

:limit.description: The maximum number of selections when multiple selections are made
:limit.description_zh: 多选时最多的选择个数

:field-names.description_zh: 自定义 SelectOptionData 中的字段

scrollbar.description: Whether to enable the virtual scrollbar

show-header-on-empty.description: Whether the header is displayed when the state is empty

show-footer-on-empty.description: Whether or not to display footer when the state is empty

events.name: change
events.params: value: string | number | boolean | Record<string, any> | (string | number | boolean | Record<string, any>)[]

events.name: input-value-change
events.description: Triggered when the value of the input field changes
events.description_zh: 输入框的值发生改变时触发

events.name: popup-visible-change
events.description: Triggered when the display status of the drop-down box changes
events.description_zh: 下拉框的显示状态改变时触发

events.name: clear
events.description: Triggered when the Clear button is clicked

events.name: remove
events.description: Triggered when the delete button of the tag is clicked
events.description_zh: 点击标签的删除按钮时触发
events.params: removed: string | number | boolean | Record<string, any> | undefined

events.name: dropdown-scroll
events.description: Triggered when the drop-down menu scrolls
events.description_zh: 下拉菜单发生滚动时触发

events.name: dropdown-reach-bottom
events.description: Triggered when the drop-down menu scrolls to the bottom
events.description_zh: 下拉菜单滚动到底部时触发

events.name: exceed-limit
events.description: Triggered when multiple selections exceed the limit
events.params: value: string | number | boolean | Record<string, any> | undefined, ev: Event

SelectOptionData.name: tagProps
SelectOptionData.description: 选项对应的多选标签的属性

VirtualListProps.name: threshold
VirtualListProps.description: 开启虚拟滚动的元素数量阈值，当数据数量小于阈值时不会开启虚拟滚动。

VirtualListProps.name: isStaticItemHeight
VirtualListProps.description: （已废除）元素高度是否是固定的。2.34.1 版本废除，请使用 fixedSize

VirtualListProps.name: fixedSize
VirtualListProps.description: 元素高度是否是固定的。

VirtualListProps.name: estimatedSize
VirtualListProps.description: 元素高度不固定时的预估高度。

VirtualListProps.name: buffer
VirtualListProps.description: 视口边界外提前挂载的元素数量。

slots.name: empty
slots.description: 选项为空时的显示内容
slots.description_zh: 选项为空时的显示内容
